GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of a single article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of object(s) of all of the comment data relating to that article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment object and returns the full comment data

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates an article based on the article id and returns the updated data

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment based on the comment id

GET /api/users.description: Should retrieve all of the user data in an array of objects

GET /api/articles?topic=searchquery.description: Should return an array of all of the articles who have a topic that matches the entered search term
